testcase.classname: Trying to Search something in Google
testcase.name: Trying to search Selenium Interview Questions in Google
testcase.system-out: Given User has already on google search page................................passed When user types Selenium Interview Questions in search input field and press enter key.passed Then User should able to get result page with title having Selenium Interview Questions.passed And close the browser.......................................................passed

testcase.classname: It contains TCs related to OrangeHRML Login page
testcase.name: check OrangeHRML login functinality with valid user
testcase.system-out: Given user in on OrangeHRML login page......................................passed When enters username as Admin in the username field.........................passed And user enters password as admin123 in OrangeHRML password field...........passed And clicks on Login button of OrangeHRML....................................passed Then dashboard page URL should contains dashboard on OrangeHRML Dashboard...passed

testcase.classname: It contains TCs related to OrangeHRML Login page
testcase.name: check OrangeHRML login functinality with invalid user
testcase.system-out: Given user in on OrangeHRML login page......................................passed When enters username as Admin in the username field.........................passed And user enters password as admin in OrangeHRML password field..............passed And clicks on Login button of OrangeHRML....................................passed Then dashboard page URL should contains login on OrangeHRML Dashboard.......passed

testcase.name: Create new lead with name as QA
testcase.system-out: Given user already in login page............................................passed And user login successfully with valid data.................................passed And click on navigation bar.................................................passed And go to Marketing and select Leads........................................passed When click on Add Leads button and enter firstname as QA ,last as Champak ,number as 123 and click on save button.passed And click on All link.......................................................passed Then varify lead is created with Champak....................................passed And close the browser.......................................................passed

testcase.name: Delete all leads
testcase.system-out: Given user already in login page............................................passed And user login successfully with valid data.................................passed And click on navigation bar.................................................passed And go to Marketing and select Leads........................................passed When click on select all leads checkbox.....................................passed And click on delete logo....................................................passed And user will get a popup to comfirm deletion, select Yes...................passed Then varify that all leads deleted..........................................passed And close the browser.......................................................passed
